alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Bradford and Alachua Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1030 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near University Of Florida, or near Gainesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Keystone Heights, Alachua, Hawthorne, Archer, University Of Florida, Rochelle, Cross Creek, Orange Heights and Gainesville Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida.
